name: Meteors (itch) (tommaso_maga)
description:
You are a space ship and have to defend yourself from incoming meteors!!

There are two game modes:

Defence - You have to stop meteors from passing below you, move left and right with A and D and shoot with Left Mouse Button.

Attack - You have to stop meteors from hitting you, move forward with W and change the way you are facing using your mouse, shoot with Left Mouse Button.

Press Escape to return to the main menu and "Exit" to close the game.

The high score will be stored so do your best!
